T02TD2520E:126b-15: khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2520E:126b-16: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2520E:126b-17: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2520E:126b-18: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2520E:126b-20: mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du //
T02TD2520E:126b-21: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2520E:126b-22: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2520E:126b-23: nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2520E:126b-24: zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02TD2520E:126b-28: nam mkha' snying po'i nga rgyal dang /
T02TD2520E:126b-29: tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams kyis rjes su gnang ba byin la /
T02TD2520E:126b-30: rang gi lha'i snying po sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2520E:126b-31: de nas phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2520E:126b-32: gzengs bstod pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2520E:126b-33: slob ma thams cad la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2520E:126b-34: aom 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan pa //
T02TD2520E:126b-35: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2520E:126b-36: srid pa gsum du grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2520E:126b-37: srid pa'i ngan 'gro dag las bton //
T02TD2520E:126b-38: kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa siddhi sa ma satvam bhur bhu ba sva: de la gzengs bstod nga ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2520E:126b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02TD2520E:126b-40: g-yon pa chos gos kyi mthar 'dzin pa'i tshul dang g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i tshul byas la /
T02TD2520E:126b-41: cho ga lhag ma rnams ni dum bu gnyis pa las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2520E:126b-43: rjes su bsgrub pa'i yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2520E:126b-44: de nas sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD2520E:126b-45: slob ma bsang gtor byas la /
T02TD2520E:126b-47: de'i g-yas pa'i mthe bong lag pa g-yas pa g-yon pas bzung nas /
T02TD2520E:126b-48: h'um gis mar gyi sbyin sreg lan bdun byas la /
T02TD2520E:127a-1: gyis slob ma la bskor ba bya ste /
T02TD2520E:127a-2: de nyid kyis dgang blugs gsum dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2520E:127a-3: de nas sangs rgyas spyan gyi de bzhin du sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2520E:127a-4: de nas slob ma'i lag par rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i gdu bu btags la /
T02TD2520E:127a-5: de nyid bzlas pa'i chus bsang gtor bya'o //
T02TD2520E:127a-6: aom ru ru aaphu ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo tsa ni sarba aartha s'a dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD2520E:127a-7: zhes bya ba sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags dang /
T02TD2520E:127a-8: snying gar byugs te slob ma gtang bar bya ba ni /
T02TD2520E:127a-9: slob ma'i thun mong gi cho ga'o //
T02TD2520E:127a-10: gang zhig slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba la ni de la dmigs te /
T02TD2520E:127a-11: mar gyi sreg blugs brgya h'um zhes bya ba dang sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2520E:127a-12: de nas sangs rgyas spyan gyi yang sbrang rtsi dang /
T02TD2520E:127a-13: mar dang zho dang bsres pa'i ting gis sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags nyid kyis dbul lo //
T02TD2520E:127a-14: de nas de bzhin du gdu bu btags la bsang gtor byas te /
T02TD2520E:127a-15: snying gar byugs nas yang snga ma bzhin du thab kyi nang du dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02TD2520E:127a-16: dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams la sbyin sreg phul nas /
T02TD2520E:127a-17: yang dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod nas /
T02TD2520E:127a-18: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de //
T02TD2520E:127a-19: phyi rol du gtor ma byin la nye reg bya ste /
T02TD2520E:127a-20: phyag rgya dgrol pa la sogs ba sngar bshad pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad nas /
T02TD2520E:127a-21: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2520E:127a-22: de nas de bzhin du rang gi lus la sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bcug la /
T02TD2520E:127a-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas ba nyid pas /
T02TD2520E:127a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa nyid do //
T02TD2520E:127a-25: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas /
T02TD2520E:127a-26: rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do //
T02TD2520E:127a-27: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas /
T02TD2520E:127a-28: chos thams cad du ma nyid do //
T02TD2520E:127a-29: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa nyid pas /
T02TD2520E:127a-30: las thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid do //
T02TD2520E:127a-31: sems can chen po legs so legs //
T02TD2520E:127a-32: bde ba chen po legs so legs //
T02TD2520E:127a-33: theg pa chen po legs so legs //
T02TD2520E:127a-34: blo gros chen po legs so legs //
T02TD2520E:127a-35: cho ga 'di ni legs par smras//
